column3: Latest;A South Korean man went to the Phnom Penh Police Office on March 4
column5: requesting authorities to help him return to his country of origin after an overstay of his visa which expired over 3 years ago on 22.01.2017.------Police say YOO HONG YUL
column7: had entered the Kingdom of Cambodia on December 22
column8: 2016 via the Poipet International Checkpoint.------The case is being forwarded to the Directorate General of Investigation and Implementation of the Directorate General of Immigration to carry out further legal proceedings.
